sections.heading: Emancipation by marriageA minor sixteen or seventeen years of age is fully emancipated by marriage
sections.text: Termination of the marriage does not affect emancipation by marriage. Emancipation by marriage may not be modified or terminated.Acts 2008, No. 786, ยง1, eff. Jan. 1, 2009; Acts 2019, No. 401, ยง1.
